subject: Basketball
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade’s business empire — one estimated at more than $10 million annually, on top of the $14 million or so he will make playing for the Heat this season — has never been stronger.
snippet: Dwyane Wade’s business empire — one estimated at more than $10 million annually, on top of the $14 million or so he will make playing for the Heat this season — has never been stronger.
